channel.title: qgis on GeoScripting
channel.description: Recent content in qgis on GeoScripting

item.title: Using GeoScript to create a GeoPackage of Natural Earth Data
item.description: Natural Earth data is a great dataset. You can easily download it as shapefiles but I like to bundle these multiple files into a single GeoPackage dataset. I wanted to use GeoScript Groovy here to show how easy it is to automate this process.
